column5: Just wondering if anybody is from either of those areas, and know if there is any ice on the small back lakes. Both areas are nearly 2 hours from my house, so I can't really just go and check... any information is quite appreciated. A buddy of mine was thinking of going somewhere this weekend... dunno about that...

just got back today (Sunday)  smaller lakes and ponds were frozen, less than 2 inches of ice, I wouldn't try to venture out though  big and medium sized lakes are wide open, no ice, weather looks mild until next weekend too  I was south of Minden around Gull Lk
